physics

Class Physics

  • java.lang.Object
    • physics.Physics

  • public class Physics
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains physical calculations
    Author:
    jafi2

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.util.ArrayList<Collider> colliders
      contains all active colliders
      private static boolean[][] collisionMatrix
      holds information with which layers another can collide
      static int LAYER_DEFAULT
      default physical layer
      will sometimes automatically replace invalid layers
      static int LAYER_ENEMY
      physical layer for enemies
      static int LAYER_PLAYER
      physical layer which should only be used for players
      static int LAYER_WORLD
      physical layer for world
      static int LAYERS 
      private static boolean NONE
      Placeholder for collisionMatrix
      static int RAYCAST_ALL
      This value is intended for raycasting in order to ignore the isBlocking value it can be used with bitwise or on the layer

    • Method Detail

      • registerCollider

        public static void registerCollider(Collider col)
        Adds collider to physics
        Parameters:
        col - Collider to add

      • physicsUpdate

        public static void physicsUpdate(double deltaTime)
        This method should be called regularly if the game is not paused
        • Updates the positions of all physicals objects
        • calls collision Events
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - time since last calculation

      • drawColliders

        public static void drawColliders()
        Draw collider wireframe for debugging

        Returns:
        hit infomation @see RaycastHit

      • raycast

        public static RaycastHit raycast(Ray ray,
                                 int layer)
        Raycast method
        Info: layer | RAYCAST_ALL in order to ignore the isBlocking value in collider
        Parameters:
        ray - Ray to cast
        layer - Layer which should be used for raycast
        Returns:
        hit infomation @see RaycastHit

        Check if this layers can collide

        layer2 - second layer
        Returns:
        can they collide?
